content:

inventory=[{"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 13, "index": 16}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 53, "index": 17}, {"type": "loom", "quantity": 20, "index": 18}, {"type": "guardian_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 20}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 50, "index": 21}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 62, "index": 22}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 26, "index": 26}, {"type": "lily_pad", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 54, "index": 32}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 36}, {"type": "andesite_wall", "quantity": 38, "index": 38}, {"type": "structure_block", "quantity": 62, "index": 39}, {"type": "coarse_dirt", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "villager_spawn_egg", "quantity": 53, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft an iron_ingot, I need to place three iron nuggets side by side in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move one iron nugget from slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
